views

Class BaseSelectionDialogProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • views.BaseSelectionDialogProgram

  • class BaseSelectionDialogProgram
extends Object
    The base (CLI) selection dialog entry point for MetaGame. This manages internally the different available scenarios and allow the user to select one of many (dynamically).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static int maxScenarioNumber
      The maximal (human readable) scenario number.
      private static Callable[] scenarios
      The available scenarios (callable returning nothing (Void).

      BaseSelectionDialogProgram()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      (package private) static void getScenario(int scenarioIndex)
      Retrieve and call the given scenario index (not to be confused with the scenario number).
      static void main(String[] args)
      The entry point prompting the user for a scenario number, that will then be run.

    • Method Detail

      • getScenario

        static void getScenario(int scenarioIndex)
                 throws Exception
        Retrieve and call the given scenario index (not to be confused with the scenario number).
        Parameters:
        scenarioIndex - the index of the scenario to run (not number).
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception occurred during in the call or the index was invalid.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        The entry point prompting the user for a scenario number, that will then be run.
        Parameters:
        args - the passed command line arguments (unused).
        Throws:
        Exception - a unhandled exception from a user-selected scenario.
